about_the_game:
Release in autumn 2025!!

Re:Night is a roguelike deck-building & turn-based strategy game. Players need to build their own deck in each roguelike adventure and defeat various powerful enemies in a chessboard battleground. Aggro, OTK, control… all kinds of decks can turn the tide and break through the siege. Besides, players can control multiple characters in battles to achieve amazing tactics such as flanking, blocking, ganking and so on. Come to this town, end the loop of nights and bring back the dawn!

You can simultaneously control three characters in battles. On the quadrilateral chessboard block, utilize various tactics, take advantage of each character’s unique abilities to win the battle!

All characters share the same deck, but each character has plenty of exclusive cards. 200+ cards with dozens of equipments, items and unique talent trees can form various decks such as aggro, OTK, midrange and control. Use them to crush your enemies!

You can utilize elemental stacking and damage burst mechanisms based on the classic rock-paper-scissors relationship between water, fire, and grass to deal tons of elemental damage. Everything needs careful planning and adaptability, from stacking elements to preventing enemies from dissipating elements and triggering damage.

Each round of game is a new experience, with diverse maps, events, battles and encounters to explore. In adventures, you will gradually understand the past of the characters, approach the truth, and solve the mystery of night loops!
